history.narrative: Law 4-7 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-38, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 10, 1981 and March 24, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 9, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-18 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
